item.title: Emacs Hugo Blogging
item.description: :ID: 0dacbf0d-550d-4db9-8e15-6ffcede1107c Hugo blogging Liked themes: Meme theme Harbor Cortex –JethroKuan Hello friend ng rhazdon Beautiful Hugo Blogging org mode Font Font: Source Code Pro : big size : Looks amazing: Is in google fonts as well //fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Slab:700,300,400|Source+Code+Pro:500 //maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.3.0/css/font-awesome.min.css Normalize css : I don’t know what it does but looks pretty cool with all these stars on github. I think I have a faint idea now about what it does. It actually makes sure all line heights and stuffs look all the same whatever the browser may be.
